thread.title: Judge blocks California law limiting publication of actors' ages
thread.title_full: Judge blocks California law limiting publication of actors' ages - POLITICO

author: Josh Gerstein
title: Judge blocks California law limiting publication of actors' ages
text: Actor Jeremy Renner attends The IMDb Studio during the 2017 Sundance Film Festival on January 22. The judge in this case ejected the state's arguments that the law was a regulation of commercial speech, finding that IMDb was acting as a publisher in posting the birthday and age information of actors online. | Getty Judge blocks California law limiting publication of actors' ages
